mapper.insert: insert into view_point (pointId, replyId, description, topicId, creatorId, createTime, enable, viewPic) values (#{pointid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{replyid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{topicid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creatorid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{enable,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{viewpic,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update view_point set replyId = #{replyid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, topicId = #{topicid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, creatorId = #{creatorid,jdbcType=CHAR}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, enable = #{enable,jdbcType=TINYINT}, viewPic = #{viewpic,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where pointId = #{pointid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select pointId, replyId, description, topicId, creatorId, createTime, enable, viewPic from view_point
